content: Hi! I'm excited about my upcoming stay. Could you please let me know the check-in process?
Hello! Welcome to my property. Check-in is from 3 PM onwards. I'll send you the access code the day before your arrival.
Perfect! Is parking available on the property?
Yes, there's free parking right in front of the building. Look for spot #12.
Hello! We're bringing 8 people for our group trip. Are there enough towels and bedding for everyone?
Hi there! Yes, the house is fully equipped for 8 guests. Fresh towels and linens are provided for everyone. Extra blankets are in the hall closet.
Wonderful! One more question - is the hot tub available during our stay?
Absolutely! The hot tub is heated and ready to use. Just remember to put the cover back on when you're done. Enjoy your stay!
Hi! I'll be arriving quite late around 11 PM. Is late check-in possible?
No problem at all! The door has a smart lock with a code. I'll text you the code on the day of arrival. Safe travels!
Hello! We're planning to celebrate a birthday during our stay. Are there any noise restrictions we should be aware of?
Happy early birthday! Please keep music and celebrations at a reasonable level after 10 PM out of respect for the neighbors. Have a great time!
Of course, we'll be respectful! Thanks for accommodating our celebration.
Hi there! I noticed this is a pending booking. When can I expect confirmation?
Hello! I'll review your booking request today and get back to you within 24 hours. Thanks for your patience!
